bin/baltsp-dt.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Balanced-DT TSP heuristic.
00003  *
00004  * Runs the Balanced-DT TSP heuristic on the given input file.  
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup bin
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "common.h"
00010 #include "lb.h"
00011 #include "tsp.h"
00012 #include "baltsp.h"
00013 
00014 /* Global variables */
00015 char *input_file = NULL;
00016 char *xml_file = NULL;
00017 char *tour_file = NULL;
00018 int edge_infinity = -1;
00019 int random_restarts = -1;
00020 int stall_count = -1;
00021 int kicks = -1;
00022 int supress_hash = ARROW_FALSE;
00023 int deep_copy = ARROW_FALSE;
00024 int lower_bound = -1;
00025 int upper_bound = INT_MAX;
00026 int basic_attempts = 1;
00027 int ut_attempts = 3;
00028 int shake_attempts = 1;
00029 int shake_rand_min = 0;
00030 int shake_rand_max = -1;
00031 int random_seed = 0;
00032 int lb_only = ARROW_FALSE;
00033 int with_improvements = ARROW_FALSE;
00034 
00035 /* Program options */
00036 #define NUM_OPTS 19
00037 arrow_option options[NUM_OPTS] = 
00038 {
00039     {'i', "input", "TSPLIB input file", 
00040         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &input_file, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00041     {'x', "xml", "file to write XML output to",
00042         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &xml_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00043     {'T', "tour", "file to write tour to",
00044         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &tour_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00045                 
00046     {'r', "restarts", "number of random restarts",
00047         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &random_restarts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00048     {'s', "stall-count", "max number of 4-swaps w/o progress",
00049         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &stall_count, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00050     {'k', "kicks", "number of 4-swap kicks",
00051         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &kicks, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00052     {'H', "supress-hash", "do not create hash table",
00053         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &supress_hash, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00054     {'d', "deep-copy", "stores data in full cost-matrix",
00055         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &deep_copy, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00056     {'I', "infinity", "value to use as infinity",
00057         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &edge_infinity, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00058         
00059     {'l', "lower-bound", "initial lower bound",
00060         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &lower_bound, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00061     {'u', "upper-bound", "initial upper bound",
00062         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &upper_bound, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00063     
00064     {'a', "basic-attempts", "number of basic attempts",
00065         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &basic_attempts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00066     {'b', "shake-1-attempts", "number of random shake attempts",
00067         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &shake_attempts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00068     {'c', "ut-attempts", "number of upper-threshold favouring attempts",
00069         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &ut_attempts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00070     {'1', "shake-1-rand-min", "min value for shake random numbers",
00071         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &shake_rand_min, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00072     {'2', "shake-1-rand-max", "max value for shake random numbers",
00073         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &shake_rand_max, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00074         
00075     {'g', "random-seed", "random number generator seed",
00076         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &random_seed, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00077         
00078     {'L', "lb-only", "only check lower bound gap",
00079         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &lb_only, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00080     {'W', "with-improvements", "use improvements (faster, poor quality solution)",
00081         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &with_improvements, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE}
00082 };
00083 char *desc = "Balanced traveling salesman problem (BalTSP) solver";
00084 char *usage = "-i tsplib.tsp [options]";
00085 
00086 /* Main method */
00087 int 
00088 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00089 {   
00090     int ret = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00091     int i, u, v, cost;
00092 
00093     arrow_problem problem;
00094     arrow_problem_info info;
00095     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params lk_params;
00096     arrow_btsp_fun fun_basic;
00097     arrow_btsp_fun fun_shake;
00098     arrow_btsp_fun fun_ut;
00099     arrow_bound_result lb_result;
00100     arrow_btsp_result tour_result;
00101     arrow_btsp_params btsp_params;
00102     
00103     double start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00104     double end_time;
00105     double avg_time;
00106     
00107     
00108     /* Read program arguments */
00109     if(!arrow_options_parse(NUM_OPTS, options, desc, usage, argc, argv, NULL))
00110         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00111     
00112     
00113     /* Try and read the problem file. */
00114     if(!arrow_problem_read(input_file, &problem))
00115         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00116     
00117     /* Gather basic info about the problem */
00118     if(!arrow_problem_info_get(&problem, !supress_hash, &info))
00119         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00120     printf("Num costs in problem: %d\n", info.cost_list_length);
00121     printf("Max cost in problem:  %d\n", info.max_cost);
00122     
00123     /* Extra processing for arguments */
00124     if(shake_rand_max < 0) 
00125         shake_rand_max = (problem.size * problem.size) + shake_rand_min;
00126     if(shake_rand_max - shake_rand_min < info.cost_list_length)
00127     {
00128         arrow_print_error("shake random interval not large enough");
00129         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00130     }
00131     
00132     /* Calculate a value for "infinity" if necessary */
00133     if(edge_infinity < 0)
00134         edge_infinity = (info.max_cost + shake_rand_max) * 2;
00135     else if(edge_infinity < info.max_cost)
00136     {
00137         arrow_print_error("Infinity value is not large enough\n");
00138         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00139     }
00140     printf("Infinity Value:       %d\n", edge_infinity); 
00141         
00142     /* Initialize random number generator */
00143     arrow_util_random_seed(random_seed);
00144 
00145     if(lower_bound < 0)
00146         lower_bound = info.min_cost;
00147     if(upper_bound < lower_bound)
00148         upper_bound = info.max_cost;
00149     
00150     /* Setup LK parameters structure */
00151     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_init(&problem, &lk_params);
00152     if(random_restarts >= 0)    lk_params.random_restarts  = random_restarts;
00153     if(stall_count >= 0)        lk_params.stall_count      = stall_count;
00154     if(kicks >= 0)              lk_params.kicks            = kicks;
00155     
00156     if(!problem.symmetric)
00157         lk_params.length_bound = (edge_infinity * -1.0) * problem.size;
00158 
00159     /* Setup necessary function structures */
00160     if(!arrow_baltsp_fun_basic(deep_copy, &fun_basic))
00161         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00162     if(!arrow_baltsp_fun_shake(deep_copy, edge_infinity, shake_rand_min, shake_rand_max, &info, &fun_shake))
00163         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00164     if(!arrow_baltsp_fun_ut(deep_copy, &fun_ut))
00165         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00166         
00167     #define SOLVE_STEPS 3
00168     arrow_btsp_solve_plan steps[SOLVE_STEPS] = 
00169     {
00170        {
00171            ARROW_TSP_CC_LK,                 /* TSP solver */
00172            (void *)&lk_params,              /* TSP solver parameters */
00173            fun_basic,                       /* fun (cost matrix function) */
00174            basic_attempts                   /* attempts */
00175        },
00176        {
00177            ARROW_TSP_CC_LK,                 /* TSP solver */
00178            (void *)&lk_params,              /* TSP solver parameters */
00179            fun_shake,                       /* fun (cost matrix function) */
00180            shake_attempts                   /* attempts */
00181        },
00182        {
00183            ARROW_TSP_CC_LK,                 /* TSP solver */
00184            (void *)&lk_params,              /* TSP solver parameters */
00185            fun_ut,                          /* fun (cost matrix function) */
00186            ut_attempts                      /* attempts */
00187        }
00188     };
00189         
00190     /* Setup BTSP parameters structure */
00191     arrow_btsp_params_init(&btsp_params);
00192     btsp_params.confirm_sol         = ARROW_FALSE;
00193     btsp_params.supress_ebst        = ARROW_FALSE;
00194     btsp_params.find_short_tour     = ARROW_FALSE;
00195     btsp_params.lower_bound         = lower_bound;
00196     btsp_params.upper_bound         = upper_bound;
00197     btsp_params.num_steps           = SOLVE_STEPS;
00198     btsp_params.steps               = steps;
00199     btsp_params.infinity            = edge_infinity;
00200     btsp_params.deep_copy           = deep_copy;
00201     
00202     
00203     /* Setup BTSP results structure and solve BTSP */
00204     arrow_btsp_result_init(&problem, &tour_result);
00205     if(!arrow_balanced_tsp_dt(&problem, &info, &btsp_params, lb_only,
00206                               with_improvements, &lb_result, &tour_result))
00207     {
00208         arrow_print_error("Could not solve BTSP on given problem.\n");
00209         ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00210         goto CLEANUP;
00211     }
00212     end_time = arrow_util_zeit() - start_time;
00213     
00214     
00215     /* Perform sanity check on found tours, output them to file if requested */
00216     if(tour_result.found_tour)
00217     {        
00218         for(i = 0; i < problem.size; i++)
00219         {
00220             u = tour_result.tour[i];
00221             v = tour_result.tour[(i + 1) % problem.size];
00222             cost = problem.get_cost(&problem, u, v);
00223 
00224             if((cost < tour_result.min_cost) || (cost > tour_result.max_cost))
00225             {
00226                 fprintf(stderr, "Found tour is no good!\n");
00227                 fprintf(stderr, "C[%d,%d] = %d\n", u, v, cost);
00228                 ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00229                 goto CLEANUP;
00230             }
00231             else if(cost < 0)
00232             {
00233                 fprintf(stderr, "Negative edge in tour -- is this okay?\n");
00234                 fprintf(stderr, "C[%d,%d] = %d\n", u, v, cost);
00235             }
00236         }   
00237     }
00238     
00239     /* Standard output */
00240     printf("Lower Bound: %d\n", lb_result.obj_value);
00241     printf("Lower Bound Time: %.2f\n", lb_result.total_time);      
00242     
00243     printf("Found Tour: %s\n", (tour_result.found_tour ? "Yes" : "No"));
00244     if(tour_result.found_tour)
00245     {
00246         printf("Obj. Value:  %d\n", tour_result.max_cost - tour_result.min_cost);
00247         printf("Min. Cost:   %d\n", tour_result.min_cost);
00248         printf("Max. Cost:   %d\n", tour_result.max_cost);
00249         printf("Tour Length: %.0f\n", tour_result.tour_length);
00250     }
00251     printf("Search steps: %d\n", tour_result.bin_search_steps);
00252     
00253     for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00254     {
00255         if(tour_result.solver_attempts[i] > 0)
00256         {
00257             avg_time = tour_result.solver_time[i] / 
00258                 (tour_result.solver_attempts[i] * 1.0);
00259             
00260             printf(" - ");
00261             arrow_tsp_long_name(i, stdout);
00262             printf("\n");
00263             printf("   - Calls: %d\n", tour_result.solver_attempts[i]);
00264             printf("   - Avg Time: %.2f\n", avg_time);
00265         }
00266     }
00267     
00268     printf("Total Tour Solve Time: %.2f\n", tour_result.total_time);
00269     printf("Total Time: %.2f\n", end_time);
00270     
00271     
00272     /* Xml output */
00273     if(xml_file != NULL)
00274     {
00275         FILE *xml;
00276         if(!(xml = fopen(xml_file, "w")))
00277         {
00278             arrow_print_error("Could not open xml file for writing");
00279             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00280             goto CLEANUP;
00281         }
00282         
00283         fprintf(xml, "<arrow_baltsp ");
00284             
00285         fprintf(xml, "problem_file=\"%s\"", input_file);
00286         fprintf(xml, " command_args=\"");
00287         arrow_util_print_program_args(argc, argv, xml);
00288         fprintf(xml, "\">\n");
00289     
00290         arrow_xml_element_int("lower_bound", lb_result.obj_value, xml);
00291         arrow_xml_element_double("lower_bound_time", lb_result.total_time, xml);
00292     
00293         arrow_xml_element_bool("found_tour", tour_result.found_tour, xml);
00294         if(tour_result.found_tour)
00295         {
00296             arrow_xml_element_int("objective_value", tour_result.max_cost - tour_result.min_cost, xml);
00297             arrow_xml_element_int("tour_min_cost", tour_result.min_cost, xml);
00298             arrow_xml_element_int("tour_max_cost", tour_result.max_cost, xml);
00299             arrow_xml_element_double("tour_length", tour_result.tour_length, xml);
00300         }
00301         else
00302         {
00303             arrow_xml_element_int("objective_value", -1, xml);
00304             arrow_xml_element_int("tour_min_cost", -1, xml);
00305             arrow_xml_element_int("tour_max_cost", -1, xml);
00306             arrow_xml_element_double("tour_length", -1.0, xml);
00307         }
00308 
00309         arrow_xml_element_int("search_steps", tour_result.bin_search_steps, xml);
00310 
00311         arrow_xml_element_open("solver_info", xml);
00312         for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00313         {
00314             if(tour_result.solver_attempts[i] > 0)
00315             {
00316                 arrow_xml_element_start("solver", xml);
00317             
00318                 arrow_xml_attribute_int("solver_type", i, xml);
00319                 arrow_xml_attribute_start("solver_name", xml);
00320                 arrow_tsp_short_name(i, xml);
00321                 arrow_xml_attribute_end(xml);
00322                 arrow_xml_element_end(xml);
00323             
00324                 avg_time = tour_result.solver_time[i] / (tour_result.solver_attempts[i] * 1.0);
00325                 arrow_xml_element_int("attempts", tour_result.solver_attempts[i], xml);
00326                 arrow_xml_element_double("avg_time", avg_time, xml);            
00327             
00328                 arrow_xml_element_close("solver", xml);
00329             }
00330         }
00331         arrow_xml_element_close("solver_info", xml);
00332     
00333         arrow_xml_element_double("tour_total_time", tour_result.total_time, xml);
00334         arrow_xml_element_double("total_time", end_time, xml);
00335         
00336         fprintf(xml, "</arrow_baltsp>\n");
00337         
00338         fclose(xml);
00339     }
00340     
00341     
00342     /* Tour file output */
00343     if((tour_file != NULL) && tour_result.found_tour)
00344     {
00345         FILE *tour_out;
00346         char comment[256];
00347     
00348         if(!(tour_out = fopen(tour_file, "w")))
00349         {
00350             arrow_print_error("Could not open tour file for writing");
00351             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00352             goto CLEANUP;
00353         }
00354     
00355         sprintf(comment, "Balanced TSP Tour; Length %.0f, Min Cost %d, Max Cost %d.",
00356                 tour_result.tour_length, tour_result.min_cost, tour_result.max_cost);
00357         
00358         arrow_util_write_tour(&problem, comment, tour_result.tour, tour_out);
00359     
00360         fclose(tour_out);
00361     }
00362     
00363     
00364     
00365 CLEANUP:
00366     arrow_btsp_result_destruct(&tour_result);
00367     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_basic);
00368     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_shake);
00369     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_ut);
00370     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_destruct(&lk_params);
00371     arrow_problem_destruct(&problem);
00372     return ret;
00373 }
